description:
Learn to play the pitch pipe as a non invasive, natural way to support your health. It can be used by folks who :

  • can’t read music,
  • can't sing,
  • can't match a pitch.

It’s very inexpensive. You can never play a wrong note .

A pitch pipe can be used to:

- increase lung capacity for asthma sufferers

-enhance digestion and elimination

-energize immune system

-enhance elimination

-increase circulation

-support kidney function

…and much more

Learn :

-To sustain the sound/note as long as possible to play specific notes for specific results.

-Which two notes can be blown together (for example C/C#) to increase the action of your colon to relieve constipation.

-How to use a pendulum to:

-Find the notes you need to play in any situation.

-Know how long and how often to blow the note
title: Sound For Health
